title: HnC
description: Health Care Website built with a team
Help the users to locate the hospitals around their pin code automatically
Application for services is also possible

title: MentorMate
description: MentorMate is a comprehensive mentor-view solution designed to streamline the semester-long project evaluation process in colleges.
This platform empowers mentors to efficiently assign, evaluate, and manage a select group of students.

title: Milestone Mapper
description: Milestone Mapper is a Web3 based application that helps in project management.
It helps in seamlessly integrating planning and tracking of task using Web3 Wallet, use of blockchain enhances the security of user data.
